import axios from 'axios' import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export default function EditExercise() { let navigate = useNavigate() const {id} = useParams() const[exercise, setExercise] = useState({ name:"", bodyPart:"", numberOfSets:"", numberOfReps:"", weight:"" }) const{name, bodyPart, numberOfSets, numberOfReps, weight}=exercise const onInputChange = (event) => { setExercise({...exercise,[event.target.name]:event.target.value}) } const onSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); await axios.put(`http://localhost:8080/exercises/update/${id}`, exercise) navigate("/") } const loadExercise = async () => { const result = await axios.get(`http://localhost:8080/exercises/find/${id}`) } return (
